name: Olivia Troye
role: Homeland Security Advisor to Vice President Pence
summary: Former homeland security advisor to Vice President Pence who resigned in protest of Trump's COVID-19 response and endorsed Joe Biden and Kamala Harris.

keyStatements.quote: The president's COVID response was deadly and inept. He was more concerned about the economy and his reelection than American lives.
If Donald Trump wins a second term, it will be the death of American democracy.
I saw firsthand how he would say one thing in private and another in public. He doesn't care about the American people.

timeline.event: Served on White House Coronavirus Task Force

timeline.significance: Left over Trump's handling of pandemic

credibility.background: Former homeland security and counterterrorism advisor, national security professional with experience in DHS and DOD
positions: Homeland Security Advisor to Vice President Pence (2018-2020)
White House Coronavirus Task Force member (2020)
